greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of sum over upper triangular subarray of array G defined at A190404.
link: Danny Rorabaugh, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
mathematica: f[i_, j_] :=  i + (j + i - 2)(j + i - 1)/2; (* natural number array, A000027 *)
program: def A190412(b): # Generate the constant with b bits of precision
return N(sum([sum([(1/2)^(i+(j+2*i-3)*(j+2*i-2)/2) for i in range(1,b)]) for j in range(1,b)]),b)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, May 10 2011
ext: a(49) corrected and a(50)-a(105) added by _Danny Rorabaugh_, Mar 24 2015
